articles.title: When was it? Packers' last kickoff return touchdown - Packers Wire
articles.description: It’s been almost 10 years since former Packers WR Randall Cobb returned a kickoff 108 yards for a touchdown.
articles.content:
The Green Bay Packers are approaching another decade-long gap between kickoff return touchdowns.
The Packers haven’t returned a kickoff for a score since the first week of the 2011 season.

articles.title: Yes, tear down that Calvin Griffith statue — and also listen to Rod Carew - Minneapolis Star Tribune
articles.description: Remember former Twins owner Calvin Griffith in whatever way you choose, but there's no defending his racist comments of 1978.
articles.content:
